game.name: Flyist
game.shortDescription: 비행사는 장애물을 피하고 그 길에 별을 수집해야 비행기를 제어 동적 차원 아케이드 게임이다. 각 레벨,속도가 증가하고,플레이어의 반응은 성공의 열쇠가된다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You control a small plane. You need to fly over and under the rocks and collect stars of distinction along the way.

reviewHighlights.text: I wish there was some manual game moderation on Steam. I'm seriously tired of **** like that popping up here every day.
[quote][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asset_flip]Warning: Asset Flip![/url][/quote] Flyist is a Unity Asset flip, what Valve calls a "fake game"....
